head.supplied: 13th Feby [187]1 ¶ editorial addition. ¶ W. H. Odgers ¶ The Director ¶ Botanic Gardens ¶ Year 1871 ¶ The first column contains authority numbers, issued in response to M to J. McCulloch, 23 January 18...

div.p: No. 408, pp. 500-1, unit 24, VPRS 1187/P, outward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office of Victoria.

note.p: The first column contains authority numbers, issued in response to M to J. McCulloch, 23 January 1871.Thesalary and wagesamounts in the tabulation are the sums voted by Parliament when thesupplementaryestimatesfor 1870 were passed on 22 November 1870, Votes and proceedings of the Leg i slative Assembly, second session 1870, vol 1,p. 41). However, the other sums are half those shown as voted, and half those statedby M in his request for authority numbers.
